//testbench for imm testing opcode 6 for ADDI 
00000000 00000000
00000001 1C290000 // LW $9,0($1)
00000002 1D070000 // LW $7,0($8)
00000003 00000000 //stall
00000004 00000000 //stall
00000005 00432000 // ADD $4,$2,$3
00000006 14C43000 // MUL $6,$6,$4
00000007 00090000 // ADD $0,$0,$9
00000008 20260002 // SW $6,2($1)
00000009 24070004 // BEQ $0,$7,4
0000000a 00000000
0000000b 00000000
